Serialized Form

  • Package main.java.neat.config

    • Class main.java.neat.config.ActivationConfig

      class ActivationConfig extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      -1282542185781644999L

      • Serialized Fields

        • allowedActivationFunctions
          ArrayList<ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION> allowedActivationFunctions
          List of activation functions that are allowed to be used in this NEAT implementation. This restricts which activation functions can be assigned to nodes during mutation.
        • linearActivationThreshold
          double linearActivationThreshold
          Threshold value for the linear activation function. Controls the output activation level. Default value is 0. Typically used in combination with other parameters in the activation function.
        • reluActivationThreshold
          double reluActivationThreshold
          Threshold value for the ReLU activation function. Controls the output activation level. Default value is 0. Output is the input if the input is above this threshold, 0 otherwise.
        • reluLeak
          double reluLeak
          Leak parameter for Leaky ReLU activation function. Controls the slope of the function for inputs below the activation threshold. Default value is 0. A higher value allows more signal to "leak through" for negative inputs.
        • sigmoidActivationThreshold
          double sigmoidActivationThreshold
          Threshold value for the sigmoid activation function. Controls the output activation level. Default value is 0.5. Output is 1 if the input is above this threshold, 0 otherwise.
        • stepActivationThreshold
          double stepActivationThreshold
          Threshold value for the step activation function. Controls the output activation level. Default value is 0. Output is 1 if the input is above this threshold, 0 otherwise.
        • tanhActivationThreshold
          double tanhActivationThreshold
          Threshold value for the tanh activation function. Controls the output activation level. Default value is 0. Output is 1 if the input is above this threshold, -1 otherwise.

    • Class main.java.neat.config.AggregationConfig

      class AggregationConfig extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      5248096586882534249L

      • Serialized Fields

        • allowedAggregationFunctions
          ArrayList<AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION> allowedAggregationFunctions
          List of aggregation functions that are allowed to be used in this NEAT implementation. This restricts which aggregation functions can be assigned to nodes during mutation.

    • Class main.java.neat.config.NEATConfig

      class NEATConfig extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      -6643302886500758542L

      • Serialized Fields

        • activationConfig
          ActivationConfig activationConfig
          Configuration for allowed activation functions.
        • activationDefault
          ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION activationDefault
          Default activation function for new nodes. Default is SIGMOID.
        • activationMutationRate
          double activationMutationRate
          Probability of mutating a node's activation function. Default is 0.
        • aggregationConfig
          AggregationConfig aggregationConfig
          Configuration for allowed aggregation functions.
        • aggregationDefault
          AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION aggregationDefault
          Default aggregation function for new nodes. Default is SUM.
        • aggregationMutationRate
          double aggregationMutationRate
          Probability of mutating a node's aggregation function. Default is 0.
        • biasAdjustingRate
          double biasAdjustingRate
          Probability of adjusting a node's bias during mutation. Default is 0.8.
        • biasInitDistributionType
          NEATConfig.DISTRIBUTION biasInitDistributionType
          Distribution type for initializing node bias values. Default is NORMAL.
        • biasInitMean
          double biasInitMean
          Mean for initializing node bias values. Default is 0.
        • biasInitStdev
          double biasInitStdev
          Standard deviation for initializing node bias values when using normal distribution. Default is 1.
        • biasMaxValue
          double biasMaxValue
          Maximum allowed value for node biases. Default is 50.
        • biasMinValue
          double biasMinValue
          Minimum allowed value for node biases. Default is -50.
        • biasMutationPower
          double biasMutationPower
          Power (magnitude) of bias mutations. Default is 0.1.
        • biasRandomizingRate
          double biasRandomizingRate
          Probability of completely randomizing a node's bias during mutation. Default is 0.1.
        • compatabilityThresholdAdjustingFactor
          double compatabilityThresholdAdjustingFactor
          Factor by which to adjust compatibility threshold when using dynamic adjustment. Default is 0.1.
        • compatibilityDisjointCoefficient
          double compatibilityDisjointCoefficient
          Coefficient for disjoint genes in compatibility distance calculation. Higher values give more weight to disjoint genes. Default is 1.
        • compatibilityExcessCoefficient
          double compatibilityExcessCoefficient
          Coefficient for excess genes in compatibility distance calculation. Higher values give more weight to excess genes. Default is 1.
        • compatibilityThreshold
          double compatibilityThreshold
          Threshold for genome compatibility determining species membership. Genomes with compatibility distance below this threshold are considered the same species. Default is 3.
        • compatibilityWeightCoefficient
          double compatibilityWeightCoefficient
          Coefficient for weight differences in compatibility distance calculation. Higher values give more weight to connection weight differences. Default is 0.5.
        • dynamicCompatibilityThreshold
          boolean dynamicCompatibilityThreshold
          Whether to dynamically adjust the compatibility threshold. If true, the threshold is adjusted to maintain targetNumberOfSpecies. Default is false.
        • elitism
          int elitism
          Number of top performing genomes within each species to preserve unchanged in each generation. Default is 0.
        • enabledDefault
          boolean enabledDefault
          Whether new connections are enabled by default. Default is true.
        • enabledMutationRate
          double enabledMutationRate
          Probability of toggling a connection's enabled status during mutation. Default is 0.
        • enabledRateForDisabled
          double enabledRateForDisabled
          Additional probability of toggling a disabled connection to enabled. Default is 0.
        • enabledRateForEnabled
          double enabledRateForEnabled
          Additional probability of toggling an disabled connection to enabled. Default is 0.
        • feedForward
          boolean feedForward
          Whether the network must be strictly feed-forward (no recurrent connections). Default is true.
        • fitnessCriterion
          NEATConfig.FITNESS_CRITERION fitnessCriterion
          The fitness criterion to use (maximize or minimize). Default is MAX (higher fitness values are better).
        • fitnessTermination
          boolean fitnessTermination
          Whether to terminate evolution when a fitness threshold is reached. Default is false.
        • fitnessTerminationThreshold
          double fitnessTerminationThreshold
          The fitness threshold for termination (if fitnessTermination is true). Default is 0.
        • generationTermination
          boolean generationTermination
          Whether to terminate evolution after a specific number of generations. Default is false.
        • generationTerminationThreshold
          int generationTerminationThreshold
          The generation threshold for termination (if generationTermination is true). Default is 0.
        • initConnectivity
          NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY initConnectivity
          Initial connectivity pattern for new genomes. Default is UNCONNECTED.
        • maxNumberOfHiddenNodes
          int maxNumberOfHiddenNodes
          Maximum number of hidden nodes allowed in the network. Default is Integer.MAX_VALUE (unlimited).
        • numberOfInputs
          int numberOfInputs
          Number of input nodes in the network. Determined by the problem domain.
        • numberOfOutputs
          int numberOfOutputs
          Number of output nodes in the network. Determined by the problem domain.
        • populationSize
          int populationSize
          The total number of genomes in the population. Larger populations provide more genetic diversity but require more computation. Default is 1.
        • probAddConnection
          double probAddConnection
          Probability of adding a new connection during mutation. Default is 0.03.
        • probAddNode
          double probAddNode
          Probability of adding a new node during mutation. Default is 0.01.
        • probConnectInit
          double probConnectInit
          Probability of creating each connection when using PARTIAL_* connectivity types. Default is 0.5 (50% chance per potential connection).
        • probDeleteConnection
          double probDeleteConnection
          Probability of deleting a connection during mutation. Default is 0.
        • probDeleteNode
          double probDeleteNode
          Probability of deleting a node during mutation. Default is 0.
        • probRecurrentConnection
          double probRecurrentConnection
          Probability that a new connection will be recurrent. Only relevant when feedForward is false. Default is 0.1.
        • responseAdjustingRate
          double responseAdjustingRate
          Probability of adjusting a node's response during mutation. Default is 0.7.
        • responseInitDistributionType
          NEATConfig.DISTRIBUTION responseInitDistributionType
          Distribution type for initializing node response values. Default is NORMAL.
        • responseInitMean
          double responseInitMean
          Mean for initializing node response values. Default is 1.
        • responseInitStdev
          double responseInitStdev
          Standard deviation for initializing node response values when using normal distribution. Default is 0.
        • responseMaxValue
          double responseMaxValue
          Maximum allowed value for node responses. Default is 50.
        • responseMinValue
          double responseMinValue
          Minimum allowed value for node responses. Default is -50.
        • responseMutationPower
          double responseMutationPower
          Power (magnitude) of response mutations. Default is 0.1.
        • responseRandomizingRate
          double responseRandomizingRate
          Probability of completely randomizing a node's response during mutation. Default is 0.1.
        • selectionType
          NEATConfig.SELECTION_TYPE selectionType
          Method used for selecting parent genomes during reproduction. Default is ROULETTE_WHEEL.
        • singleStructuralMutation
          boolean singleStructuralMutation
          Whether to allow only one structural mutation (add/delete node/connection) per genome per generation. Default is false.
        • speciesElitism
          int speciesElitism
          Number of species to preserve even if they stagnate. Default is 0.
        • speciesFitnessFunction
          NEATConfig.SPECIES_FITNESS_FUNCTION speciesFitnessFunction
          Method to calculate species fitness from member genome fitnesses. Default is MEAN.
        • stagnation
          int stagnation
          Number of generations with no improvement before a species is considered stagnant. Default is 15.
        • startingActivationFunctionForHiddenNode
          ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION startingActivationFunctionForHiddenNode
          Activation function to use for new hidden nodes. Default is SIGMOID.
        • startingActivationFunctionForOutputNode
          ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION startingActivationFunctionForOutputNode
          Activation function to use for new output nodes. Default is SIGMOID.
        • startingAggregationFunction
          AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION startingAggregationFunction
          Aggregation function to use for new nodes. Default is SUM.
        • startingHiddenNodes
          int[] startingHiddenNodes
          Array specifying the number of hidden nodes in each hidden layer at initialization. Default is an empty array (no hidden nodes).
        • structuralMutationAdvisor
          boolean structuralMutationAdvisor
          Whether to use a structural mutation advisor to guide mutation decisions. Default is false.
        • survivalThreshold
          double survivalThreshold
          Fraction of genomes in each species that are selected for reproduction. Default is 0.5 (50%).
        • targetNumberOfSpecies
          int targetNumberOfSpecies
          Target number of species when using dynamic compatibility threshold. Default is 0.
        • tournamentSize
          int tournamentSize
          Number of genomes to consider in tournament selection. Only used if selectionType is TOURNAMENT. Default is 1.
        • weightAdjustingRate
          double weightAdjustingRate
          Probability of adjusting a connection's weight during mutation. Default is 0.8.
        • weightInitDistributionType
          NEATConfig.DISTRIBUTION weightInitDistributionType
          Distribution type for initializing connection weight values. Default is NORMAL.
        • weightInitMean
          double weightInitMean
          Mean for initializing connection weight values. Default is 0.
        • weightInitStdev
          double weightInitStdev
          Standard deviation for initializing connection weight values when using normal distribution. Default is 1.
        • weightMaxValue
          double weightMaxValue
          Maximum allowed value for connection weights. Default is 50.
        • weightMinValue
          double weightMinValue
          Minimum allowed value for connection weights. Default is -50.
        • weightMutationPower
          double weightMutationPower
          Power (magnitude) of weight mutations. Default is 0.1.
        • weightRandomizingRate
          double weightRandomizingRate
          Probability of completely randomizing a connection's weight during mutation. Default is 0.1.

  • Package main.java.neat.core

    • Class main.java.neat.core.Agent

      class Agent extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      3215925558128015737L

      • Serialized Fields

        • adjustedFitness
          double adjustedFitness
          Adjusted fitness of the agent.
        • fitness
          double fitness
          Fitness of the agent.
        • genome
          Genome genome
          Genome or the neural network of the agent.
        • speciesNumber
          int speciesNumber
          Species number that the agent does belong to.

    • Class main.java.neat.core.Connection

      class Connection extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      6206971791599788488L

      • Serialized Fields

        • enabled
          boolean enabled
          Connection status flag (true = active, false = disabled).
        • from
          Node from
          Source node where this connection originates.
        • innovationNumber
          int innovationNumber
          Unique historical marker for tracking structural innovations (default: unassigned).
        • nodeAddable
          boolean nodeAddable
          Mutation flag indicating if this connection can be split to add a new node.
        • recurrent
          boolean recurrent
          Recurrency flag (true = connection creates a feedback loop).
        • to
          Node to
          Destination node where this connection terminates.
        • weight
          double weight
          Connection weight determining signal strength/amplification.

    • Class main.java.neat.core.Genome

      class Genome extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      -1380168298131314999L

      • Serialized Fields

        • connections
          LinkedList<Connection> connections
          All connections between nodes in the genome.
        • height
          int height
          Vertical dimension of the visualization area in pixels. Used to calculate node coordinates for rendering.
        • hiddenNodes
          LinkedList<Node> hiddenNodes
          Subset of nodes in hidden layers.
        • inputNodes
          LinkedList<Node> inputNodes
          Subset of nodes designated as network inputs.
        • maxInnovationNumber
          int maxInnovationNumber
          Highest innovation number among all connections (tracks structural mutations).
        • mutated
          boolean mutated
          Mutation status flag - true if genome has been altered since last generation.
        • neatConfig
          NEATConfig neatConfig
          Configuration parameters for evolution (mutation rates, compatibility thresholds, etc.).
        • nodes
          LinkedList<Node> nodes
          All nodes in the genome (input, hidden, and output nodes).
        • nodesByLayer
          LinkedList<Node>[] nodesByLayer
          Nodes organized by layer index (0 = input, 1..n = hidden layers, last = output).
        • nodesCoordinates
          HashMap<Node,double[]> nodesCoordinates
          Visualization coordinates mapped to nodes (x,y positions for rendering).
        • nodeSize
          double nodeSize
          Display size of nodes during visualization (diameter in pixels).
        • numOfHiddenlayers
          int numOfHiddenlayers
          Number of hidden layers in the network architecture.
        • outputNodes
          LinkedList<Node> outputNodes
          Subset of nodes designated as network outputs.
        • width
          int width
          Horizontal dimension of the visualization area in pixels. Used to calculate node coordinates for rendering.

    • Class main.java.neat.core.Node

      class Node extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      -2812820096558333256L

      • Serialized Fields

        • activationFunction
          ActivationFunction activationFunction
          Activation function determining node output (e.g., sigmoid, ReLU).
        • aggregationFunction
          AggregationFunction aggregationFunction
          Function for combining input signals (e.g., sum, product).
        • bias
          double bias
          Bias value added to aggregated inputs before activation.
        • inputConnections
          LinkedList<Connection> inputConnections
          Incoming connections from predecessor nodes.
        • layer
          int layer
          Layer position in the network (0 = input, hidden layers increment, Integer.MAX_VALUE = output).
        • outputConnections
          LinkedList<Connection> outputConnections
          Outgoing connections to successor nodes.
        • response
          double response
          Scaling factor modifying the activation function output.
        • selfRecurrentConnection
          Connection selfRecurrentConnection
          Recurrent connection allowing self-loop feedback.
        • splitInnovationNumber
          int splitInnovationNumber
          Innovation number tracking node creation through connection splitting.
        • type
          Node.TYPE type
          Node type (input/hidden/output) determining its role in the network.
        • value
          double value
          Current computed output value after activation.

  • Package main.java.neat.functions

    • Class main.java.neat.functions.ActivationFunction

      class ActivationFunction extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      -6209934906347181073L

      • Serialized Fields

        • activatedValue
          double activatedValue
          The last value computed by the activate() method. This allows checking activation status without recomputation.
        • threshold
          double threshold
          The threshold value that determines when a node is considered "activated". When the output of the activation function exceeds this threshold, isActivated() will return true.

      class AggregationFunction extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      422002331363828167L
